name: Eurogroup for Animals
goal: Eurogroup for Animals is a federation of non-governmental organisations, which is committed to improving the way animals are treated and kept throughout the European Union. It uses its scientific and technical expertise to advise on animal welfare issues and encourages the EU and retailers to adopt higher standards on animal welfare.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Consumer Affairs, Enlargement, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Slaughter, Live Animal Transport, Dairy cows, Organic farming, Pigs, Sustainable food, Companion Animals, Equines
